name: PNN Soft
description:
PNN Soft is an offshore software development company located in Kiev, Ukraine.
We specialize in innovative IT solutions, consulting and complex software projects development. You can outsource to us any part of software development cycle: IT consulting and analysis, software design, software development and software testing. 
PNN has more than 10 years of experience in delivering software development outsourcing services to customers. Among our services:
Software product development
Mobile Apps development (Android, iOS, BlackBerry, Windows)
QA and Testing
Software maintenance and support
Design Development
R&D services
PNN is IBM business partner. While providing enterprise automation services we use IBM BPM product line. To see our products visit www.pnnproducts.com
We use modern technologies: Java, C#: .Net, Win Forms, ASP.Net, HTML\HTML5, Flash\Flex, Ajax,JavaScript, Web 2.0 etc.
